input.sentences: waiting at the top for a pleasure boat ride .
more people come across the bridge for a boat ride .
how lovely to be taking a boat ride .
the guard in his office monitoring the grounds and water .
boat riding on a petty summer day .
output.sentences: It was a beautiful day and we waited eagerly, on top, for our ride.
People were willing to wait a long time for that ride across the water.
Taking a ferry ride across the water was lovely.
We didn't know it at the time, but there was an office monitoring the ferry boats as they passed by.
Riding the boats on the water makes a pretty picture and a happy memory.
